courseDetails.title: Web Development Fully Complete Guideline
courseDetails.descriptionText: Learn JavaScript, HTML, and CSS from scratch. Gain real-world experience through projects and exercises designed to help you master web development step by step. This course is ideal for beginners and intermediate learners.
courseDetails.learnTitle: What Will I Learn From This Course?
courseDetails.learnText: You’ll learn modern JavaScript, responsive design, and advanced HTML/CSS. By the end, you’ll be able to build interactive websites, handle dynamic content, and apply industry-standard practices in web development.
